queries.sql: SELECT jml, jml_prev, ROUND((jml - jml_prev)/ jml_prev * 100, 2) AS growth FROM ( SELECT COUNT(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%", id_barang, NULL)) AS jml, COUNT(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%", id_barang, NULL)) AS jml_prev FROM toko_penjualan_detail LEFT JOIN toko_penjualan USING(id_penjualan) WHERE tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%" OR tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%" ) AS tabel

SELECT jml, jml_prev, ROUND((jml - jml_prev)/ jml_prev * 100, 2) AS growth FROM ( SELECT COUNT(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%", id_penjualan, NULL)) AS jml, COUNT(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%", id_penjualan, NULL)) AS jml_prev FROM toko_penjualan WHERE tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%" OR tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%" ) AS tabel

SELECT jml, jml_prev, ROUND((jml - jml_prev)/ jml_prev * 100, 2) AS growth FROM ( SELECT SUM(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%", total_harga, NULL)) AS jml, SUM(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%", total_harga, NULL)) AS jml_prev FROM toko_penjualan WHERE tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%" OR tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%" ) AS tabel

SELECT jml, jml_prev, ROUND( (jml-jml_prev) / jml_prev * 100 ) AS growth, total FROM ( SELECT COUNT(jml) AS jml, COUNT(jml_prev) AS jml_prev, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM toko_pelanggan) AS total FROM ( SELECT MAX(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%", 1, NULL)) AS jml, MAX(IF(tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%", 1, NULL)) AS jml_prev FROM toko_penjualan WHERE tgl_transaksi LIKE "2022%" OR tgl_transaksi LIKE "2021%" GROUP BY id_pelanggan ) AS tabel ) tabel_utama

SELECT MONTH(tgl_transaksi) AS bulan, COUNT(id_penjualan) as JML, SUM(total_harga) total FROM toko_penjualan WHERE tgl_transaksi >= "2020-01-01" AND tgl_transaksi <= "2020-12-31" GROUP BY MONTH(tgl_transaksi)

SELECT MONTH(tgl_transaksi) AS bulan, COUNT(id_penjualan) as JML, SUM(total_harga) total FROM toko_penjualan WHERE tgl_transaksi >= "2021-01-01" AND tgl_transaksi <= "2021-12-31" GROUP BY MONTH(tgl_transaksi)

SELECT MONTH(tgl_transaksi) AS bulan, COUNT(id_penjualan) as JML, SUM(total_harga) total FROM toko_penjualan WHERE tgl_transaksi >= "2022-01-01" AND tgl_transaksi <= "2022-12-31" GROUP BY MONTH(tgl_transaksi)

SELECT id_barang, nama_barang, COUNT(id_barang) AS jml FROM toko_penjualan_detail LEFT JOIN toko_penjualan USING(id_penjualan) LEFT JOIN toko_barang USING(id_barang) WHERE tgl_transaksi >= "2022-01-01" AND tgl_transaksi <= "2022-12-31" GROUP BY id_barang ORDER BY jml DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT id_kategori, nama_kategori, COUNT(id_barang) AS jml, SUM(harga) AS nilai FROM toko_penjualan_detail LEFT JOIN toko_penjualan USING(id_penjualan) LEFT JOIN toko_barang USING(id_barang) LEFT JOIN toko_barang_kategori USING(id_kategori) WHERE tgl_transaksi >= "2022-01-01" AND tgl_transaksi <= "2022-12-31" GROUP BY id_kategori ORDER BY nilai DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT id_pelanggan, foto, nama_pelanggan, SUM(total_harga) AS total_harga FROM toko_penjualan LEFT JOIN toko_pelanggan USING(id_pelanggan) WHERE YEAR(tgl_transaksi) = 2022 GROUP BY id_pelanggan ORDER BY total_harga DESC LIMIT 5
